author: Abdullah Abunayyan
comment: I use this daily but two days ago it stopped working and I got no response from the Path support team. Enjoy your 1 star.
title: Loved it at first but doesn't work anymore

author: Mohammed Aldossary
comment: It's been a couple of days now where I cannot receive or send messages and all of my previous messages got deleted. In addition, this app was never fully compatible with Android system.

author: John Paulo Ramos
comment: Hey devs, please make an update about it because basically its broken. And its not just me who is experiencing it, thank you a lot! I know maintaining this app is not easy but you guys can do it. Anyway why would you be in the position if you can't, ciao!
title: Needs update.

author: Albanderey Fahad
comment: I e-mailed the support and haven't recievced a reply yet !!! When are you going to fix the problem? It's been 5 days now, I can't use any feature of this pointless app !!!!! And I have noticed that this lag only accures for Android users !! If there were less than one start I'd totally rate this app with it.
title: Really bad !!!

author: christine Veronica
comment: Why I have to install different apk. path and path talk
title: Its not pratical

author: hejo justin
comment: Please integrate this into the main app itself, so that i can access it by swiping right to left, or something like that. Don't want two apps, also bring features like floating chat heads (Facebook uses it but i think it would be a useful feature in any messaging app).
title: "It's beginning to look a lot like Facebook" (Don't be like Facebook)

comment: I activate the "Friends Can See What I'm Listening To" option but still not showing the songs I play, even though I play it with the original music app. ( Sony Device ).
title: How Can I Let Others See What I'm Listening to?

You should add it as an option though on whether or not you want the messages to he deleted.
title: Love it!!!
